General.Name: Cascadero Copper Corp
General.Description: Cascadero Copper Corporation, an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties primarily in Argentina. The company explores for cesium, silver, zinc, lead, gold, uranium, copper, tellurium, tin, molybdenum, iron, and rubidium ores. It holds interests in 27 mineral properties located in the northern area of the Argentine Puna. Cascadero Copper Corporation was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in North Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 901 West Third Street, North Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7P 3P9
